details: This beginner-friendly course covers the basics of programming using Python.
Explore the foundational concepts of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Gain a comprehensive understanding of data science techniques and tools.
Embark on an introductory journey into machine learning, covering algorithms and applications.
Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms effectively.
Master the concepts and techniques of managing databases efficiently.
Understand the basics of cybersecurity and learn to protect digital assets.
Explore the fundamental principles and techniques of graphic design.
Learn effective strategies for marketing products and services online.
